locations.name: Bathroom
locations.walkDesc: You walk into a small, dimly lit bathroom attached to the overlook's parking lot. Along the wall are sinks with mirrors above them. In the air you smell mildew and ammonia.
locations.lookDesc: You are standing in a small, dimly lit bathroom attached to the overlook's parking lot. Along the wall are sinks with mirrors above them. In the air you smell mildew and ammonia.

locations.name: Overlook Parking Lot
locations.walkDesc: You enter a parking lot overlooking a lake.
locations.lookDesc: You are standing in a parking lot overlooking a lake.
